Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing and can curse with Lycanthropy
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Spear, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Werewolf makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Claws or Spear

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is Humanoid
Abilities.Ability 2: Keen Hearing and Smell, The Werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
